name: DAS Technology - Television and Satellite
tag_list: cctv, access-control, door-entry, das-security, security-uk, security-solutions
overview:
With stories of spiraling crime statistics seemingly dominating the news it’s easy to think that we live in a world where everyone is a heartbeat away from breaking the law.The truth is our country is still an overwhelmingly safe place to live and work, but there’s no doubt that taking security seriously is a smart move on every level.

That’s why at DAS Security we refuse to shower you in statistics designed to make you anxious, or accelerate a security arms race with your neighbours so you are forced to constantly upgrade your systems.

What we do is listen to what you need to deliver your peace of mind and use our expertise to deliver it. No scare tactics, no histrionics, just professional, honest advice. Our engineering heritage means we can design, install and maintain security systems for a wide range of uses from homes, shops and offices to shopping centres, schools and car parks.

We’ll provide you with a bespoke security solution that meets your needs, and all completely hassle free. Our nationwide network of engineers is trained to the highest standard in order to install your system with a professional, efficient and reliable service.
